title: Carlos's First Thanksgiving
subtle: Realistic (fiction), 270 words, Level H (Grade 1), Lexile 450L, Fiction Series
description: Carlos and his family are looking forward to their first Thanksgiving dinner in America. everything is going as planned until a big snowstorm prevents the guests from coming. everyone in the neighborhood is worried about what they will do for Thanksgiving dinner. Then Carlos comes up with a plan that reflects the true meaning of Thanksgiving. Students will have the opportunity to sequence events and to reflect on the meaning of Thanksgiving as they read this book.
reviewWords: Abuela, dessert, holiday, neighbors, pasta, share, tamales, Thanksgiving, turkey
wordWork: Compound Words                : Recognize and use compound words
